E-Commerce Website Development

A step-by-step workshop on launching your own WooCommerce store with WordPress.

View Curriculum

Course Overview

In this hands-on course, you’ll learn how to install, configure, and customize WordPress and the WooCommerce plugin to build a fully functional online store. Perfect for beginners and developers alike, by the end you’ll have launched a live e-commerce site, complete with product pages, payment gateways, and responsive design.

What You’ll Learn

Responsive Themes

Choose and customize a WooCommerce-ready theme that looks great on any device.

Product Management

Set up product categories, variations, SKUs, and inventory tracking.

Payment & Shipping

Integrate payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) and configure shipping rules.

Curriculum & Modules

Module 1: WordPress Fundamentals
  • • Installing WordPress on your server
  • • Overview of themes, plugins & the dashboard
  • • Basic security and backups
Module 2: Getting Started with WooCommerce
  • • Installing & activating WooCommerce
  • • Configuring store settings
  • • Adding your first products
Module 3: Theme Customization
  • • Selecting a responsive theme
  • • Using the Customizer & child themes
  • • Custom CSS tricks
Module 4: Plugins & Extensions
  • • Must-have WooCommerce extensions
  • • SEO & performance plugins
  • • Marketing automation add-ons

Who This Is For

Ideal for small-business owners, aspiring developers, or educators looking to add e-commerce expertise. Basic familiarity with the web and WordPress is helpful but not required.
